attributes.action: Introduce a Bill banning  MP's not elected in England from voting on bills which only affect England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
English people now have the situation whereby Bills which only affect England are voted on by MP's elected in Scotland,Wales and Northern Ireland.
This situation is making the terms United Kingdom and Great Britain meaningless when MP's elected in one part can dictate policies to England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
